pageProduct.name: Optive Fusion Eye Drops 30 X 0.4mL
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Optive Fusion Preservative-Free Lubricant Eye Drops hydrate and protect dry eyes.

Combination formula to provide instant relief of dry, irritated and gritty eyes. 

- Helps maintain hydration. 
- Provides sustained protection. 
- Promotes eye surface retention. 
- Compatible with contact lenses. 
- Preservative-free for sensitive eyes. 

Single-use containers. 

Suitable for use post LASIK surgery. May be used as a protectant against further irritation. 

Suitable For: Suitable for use post LASIK surgery.

Product Claims: Preservative-free.

Size: 30 x 0.4mL

Directions

Make sure container is intact before use. To open, COMPLETELY TWIST OFF TAB, then pull to remove. Instil 1 or 2 drops in the affected eye(s) as needed and discard unused contents. Can be used as often as needed. Please retain for future reference.

USAGE ADVICE

Keep the single ampoules in the pouch until use. Once the pouch is opened, protect from light.For external use only.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.
